name: Lipa Planets: The Book
description:
In this stellar interactive book, kids join Skipper the space dog as he explores our solar system and learns how the planets got their names!

• 3 exciting play modes for your child to read along;
• Let your child make out the sounds and watch the vivid animations;
• Help Skipper fly through space and turn planets into Roman gods;
• Learn why the planets have the names they do.

It's a sure way to bring your child into the world of reading and learn about the sky above.

Lipa Planets is an educational app ideal for kids aged 5+.

Have you learned all about the gods of our solar system? Discover our other challenging & fun apps!

Enjoy voiceovers in your native language and even accent. Available in both British and American English, German, Spanish, Mexican Spanish, French, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Czech, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Swedish, Dutch, Vietnamese, Hebrew, Korean, Malay, Indonesian and Ukrainian!

Crafted by Lipa Learning, a community of educators and creative professionals dedicated to revolutionizing childhood development.
